name: com.actionfit.projectinstaller
description:
Unity Project Installer is an automated tool designed to initialize your Unity project.

It installs essential packages (e.g., Newtonsoft.Json, VContainer, UniTask) with a single click.

This tool supports both OpenUPM and Git packages, ensuring a streamlined setup.

After installation, the installer package removes itself automatically.

Usage:
Go to 'ActFit/Project Initialize' in the Unity Editor menu to start the process.
